title: Legal Aid Check Financial Eligibility create dependent payload schema
description: This schema defines the payload required to define the applicant's income during the calculation period for  the Legal Aid Check Financial Eligibility API

wage_slip.description: An object describing a salary or wage payment and deductions

payment_date.description: The date upon which the payment was received

paye.description: Income tax deducted from gross pay

nic.description: National Insurance contribution deducted from gross pay

benefit_name.description: The type of benefit received - must be one of the values listed in the enum below

payment_date.description: The date the benefit payment was received

assessment_id.description: The UUID of the assessment returned from the call to the assessment endpoint

income.description: An object describing wage slips and benefit payment receipts during the calculation period

wage_slips.description: An array of objects describing each wage slip received during the calculation period

benefits.description: An array of objects describing each benefit payment received during the calculation period
